abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include: (a) Civil
            works and related supervision for the construction of a
            four-lane paved highway (25 km) between Duran and Boliche;
            (b) civil works and related supervision for the construction
            of a development road between Puerto Ila and Doblones (29
            km) and for the construction and improvement of about 75 km
            of lateral feeder roads in the area of influence of the
            Puerto Ila-Doblones road; and (c) pre-investment and
            organizational studies for the preparation of a regional
            secondary and feeder road program.
